problem:
open Classical

theorem forall_iff {X : Type} {P Q : X → Prop} :
  (∀ x, P x ↔ Q x) → ((∀ x, P x) ↔ (∀ x, Q x)) :=
fun h => ⟨fun hp x => (h x).1 (hp x), fun hq x => (h x).2 (hq x)⟩

theorem not_exists {X : Type} {P : X → Prop} :
  ¬ (∃ x, P x) → ∀ x, ¬ P x :=
fun h x hp => h ⟨x, hp⟩

theorem not_forall {X : Type} {P : X → Prop} :
  ¬ (∀ x, P x) → ∃ x, ¬ P x := by
